page.title: 06 SOUTH-AYR RECREATION
page.content: {BOWLING} At Seafield there is a bowling club with c. 140 members. {CRICKET} Ayr Cricket Club runs 9 XIs,has 2 pitches and plays in the Western Union at Cambusdoon. {GOLF} There are 18 hole courses at Belleisle and Seafield. {HOCKEY Ayr Hockey Club at Cambusdoon has ladies' and men's sections. {SAILING Mirror and A.B.class dinghies are popular at Ayr Bay Sailing Club which has a membership of 97. {SMALLBORE SHOOTING { }Ayr Rifle Club, affiliated to N.S.R.A. meets 5 times a week. {SQUASH { }Locally there are 2 squash courts.
